name: Puzzles and Board Games Mega Collection
name_original: Puzzles and Board Games Mega Collection
description:
10 of the most popular Puzzles and Board Games all in one collection. Enjoy the following games:

  • 16 unique Chess boards and piece sets.
  • 7 variations of Mahjongg with 15 tile sets and 75 layouts.
  • Popular board games: Checkers, Mancala, Dominoes, Cribbage, and Backgammon.
  • Sudoku, Tangrams, and other challenging puzzles.
  • Bonus games Hearts and Blackjack also included.

Features relaxing gameplay that's fun for the whole family.

  • Big cards and pieces for easy readability.
  • Customizable interface with modern, easy-to-use design.
  • Multiple skill levels, tutorials, and stat tracking.
  • 25 backgrounds to choose from.
